sentences.en: And where it is needed—to organise investment in infrastructure, for instance, and to regulate markets—it needs to become more open in its dealings.
sentences.cn: 而在那些需要政府去组织投资、监管市场的方面（比如说基础设施部门），在管理过程中需要变得更为开放。

sentences.en: Anticipate heavy business times and organise procedures.
sentences.cn: 能够预见餐厅生意的高峰期并安排行动.

sentences.en: B: That could be a good idea. The hotel would organise a guide.
sentences.cn: 那是个好主意. 旅馆可能安排导游.

sentences.en: Continue to organise liaison tours to maintain close relationship with mainland officials.
sentences.cn: 会继续组织访问交流团,与内地领导保持紧密联系.

sentences.en: Do they organise words around a principle of syntax?
sentences.cn: 他们会按照一定的句法规则组织单词吗？

sentences.en: Don't wait until New Year to resolve to organise your life. There's no time like the present.
sentences.cn: 不要等到新年才下决心规划生活。要把握当下。

sentences.en: He has the ability to organise.
sentences.cn: 他很有组织才能.

sentences.en: How do you organise your plant to sustain this safety?
sentences.cn: 你如何组织你的电站使它能保持安全？

sentences.en: I have to organise a seating plan for the dinner.
sentences.cn: 我必须要为晚餐安排座次.

sentences.en: Organise assigned station and ensure readiness prior to guest arrival.
sentences.cn: 检查好服务台,在客人到来之前做好准备.

sentences.en: Organise more joint - institute forums to enhance consultative work amongst our sector.
sentences.cn: 筹办更多联会论坛,加强业界的谘询工作.

sentences.en: Oslash ; Beta and her brother organise the remaining Cybertronians into resistance fighters.
sentences.cn: 赛天骄及其兄弟集结幸存塞伯坦人建抵抗组织.

sentences.en: Smith prides himself on being able to organise his own life.
sentences.cn: 史密斯对能够把自己的生活安排得井井有条感到很得意。

sentences.en: The question is how to organise such a discussion effectively.
sentences.cn: 问题是如何有效地组织这样一个讨论。

sentences.en: The team then started to organise a set of clinical trials of personalised treatments for lung and breast cancer.
sentences.cn: 于是研究小组开始着手组织一套针对肺癌和乳腺癌病人的个人化治疗临床试验。

sentences.en: To organise and conduct market research and development, and customer requirement review.
sentences.cn: 组织并开展市场调查和开发, 以及顾客需求评审.

sentences.en: To organise, direct and supervise the School Improvement Program activities in communities.
sentences.cn: 负责学校改进项目在县办社区的组织 、 管理和实施.

sentences.en: We can organise car rental from Chicago O'Hare Airport.
sentences.cn: 我们可以安排提供从芝加哥奥黑尔机场出发的租车服务。

sentences.en: We would organise the sports meetings in co - operation with the police.
sentences.cn: 我们将与警察合作一起举办运动会.

sentences.en: Zip drives help people to organise their important information.
sentences.cn: 压缩磁盘驱动器有助于人们管理重要信息。

words.tran_cn: [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的
有组织的；组织起来的（等于organized）
有组织的；安排有秩序的；做事有条理的
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
[生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音
有机体说；唯器官变化论
组织者；承办单位；[生物] 组织导体
组织；使有系统化；给予生机；组织成立工会等
组织（等于organize）；有机化；给予生机

trans.tran_cn: 组织，筹备 ，安排，组建，成立（NAmE=organize）
组织， 安排； 使有条理； 使有机化
